short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get spoiled in life, not in disc golf.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I created an extension for unspoiling lead cards in disc golf youtube videos. If it detects a lead card, it will replace the names with asterisks and blur the video thumbnail. The original title will still be shown on the mouse over tooltip.

If you decide to use this, please consider donating. This will help me stay motivated for future updates and so on :)

# Donations
Buy me a coffee, a pizza or a house by using the following link:
https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=CYXU47FTCHC4G

# Changelog

## Version 1.0
Initial release.

## Version 1.1
- Finds more text content to unspoil.
- Improved algorithm for unspoiling.
- Faster and more reliable.
- Support for both light and dark Youtube themes.
- New user option interface.
- Added option to set replacement string.
- Added option to not unspoil first rounds (R1).
- Added option to unspoil tooltips as well.
- Added option to unspoil thumbnail images (blur).

## Version 1.2
- Made video titles clickable with middle mouse button and by CTRL-clicking.

## Version 1.3
- Fixed visibility bug for video titles.
